item.title: 特朗普以安全和中国相关问题为由阻止芯片交易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五以国家安全和中国相关问题为由，阻止了美国光电子公司HieFo Corp斥资300万美元收购总部位于新泽西州的航空航天与国防专家Emcore公司的资产。【原文：President Donald Trump on Friday blocked U.S. photonics firm HieFo Corp's $3 million acquisition of assets in New Jersey-based aerospace and defense specialist Emcore, citing national security and China-related concerns.】

item.title: S3 Partners称，特朗普媒体的空头兴趣在近期反弹后攀升
item.description: 金融数据公司 S3 Partners 的数据显示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司最近宣布合并后，空头兴趣骤增，表明一些交易商预计该股将回吐近期涨幅。【原文：Short interest in U.S. President Donald Trump's social media company has jumped following a recent merger announcement, suggesting some traders expect the stock to give back more of its recent gains, according to financial data firm S3 Partners.】

item.title: Equinor 质疑美国暂停帝国风电项目的命令
item.description: 挪威能源集团 Equinor 周五表示，已向美国哥伦比亚特区地方法院提起民事诉讼，挑战美国内政部暂停帝国风电项目的命令。【原文：Norwegian energy group Equinor said on Friday it had filed a civil suit in the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia challenging a U.S. Department of the Interior order to suspend its Empire Wind project.】

item.title: 消息人士称，D.E. Shaw 旗舰基金战胜了市场波动性，将在 2025 年击败标准普尔 500 指数
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周五告诉路透社，投资公司 D.E. Shaw 旗下的两只旗舰基金在 2025 年跑赢了基准 S&P 500 指数，反映了对冲基金同行在波动性创纪录的一年中所表现出的类似实力。【原文：Investment firm D.E. Shaw's two flagship funds beat the benchmark S&P 500 index in 2025, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday, reflecting similar strength seen across hedge fund peers during a year of record volatility.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，埃利奥特合伙人杰森-根里奇（Jason Genrich）已离开对冲基金
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）周五告诉客户，领导该公司多项技术投资的杰森-根里奇（Jason Genrich）已经离开了这家对冲基金。【原文：Elliott Investment Management on Friday told clients that Jason Genrich, who led many of the firm's technology investments, has left the hedge fund, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伯克希尔哈撒韦公司进入后巴菲特时代，股价一路走低
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）的 "后巴菲特时代 "周五悄然开启，在 "奥马哈甲骨文 "将掌舵六十年的最高职位交给格雷格-阿贝尔后，公司股价略有下滑。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway's , post-Buffett era began quietly Friday, as shares slipped slightly after the "Oracle of Omaha" handed Greg Abel the top job following six decades at the helm.】

item.title: 法国部长向检察官举报 Grok 在 X 平台上发布与性有关的内容
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 在 X 平台上生成了露骨的性内容，法国部长们已向检察官报告，并在周五的一份声明中称，这些 "性和性别歧视 "内容 "显然是非法的"。【原文：French ministers have reported to prosecutors sexually explicit content generated by Elon Musk's xAI artificial intelligence chatbot Grok on the X platform, saying in a statement on Friday the "sexual and sexist" content was "manifestly illegal".】

item.title: 奢侈品零售商萨克斯全球首席执行官马克-梅特里克卸任
item.description: 萨克斯全球（Saks Global）周五表示，首席执行官马克-梅特里克（Marc Metrick）已经卸任，并任命执行主席理查德-贝克（Richard Baker）为其继任者，有报道称这家奢侈品零售商正准备破产。【原文：Saks Global said on Friday CEO Marc Metrick has stepped down, naming Executive Chairman Richard Baker as his successor, amid reports that the luxury retailer is preparing for bankruptcy.】

item.title: 交付信心增强，空中客车公司将于 1 月 12 日发布数据
item.description: 空中客车公司周五证实，将于1月12日发布经审计的年终商业数据，这显然表明该公司对最近修订的 "约790架 "交付目标充满信心。【原文：Airbus confirmed on Friday it would issue audited end-year commercial data on Jan 12 in an apparent sign of confidence in its recently revised target of "around 790" deliveries.】

item.title: Grok 称保障措施失误导致 X 上出现 "穿着极少衣物的未成年人 "图像
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 人工智能聊天机器人 Grok 周五表示，保障措施的失误导致社交媒体平台 X 上出现了 "描绘未成年人穿着极少服装的图片"，目前正在进行改进以防止出现这种情况。【原文：Elon Musk's xAI artificial intelligence chatbot Grok said on Friday lapses in safeguards had resulted in "images depicting minors in minimal clothing" on social media platform X and that improvements were being made to prevent this.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求下降，特斯拉季度交付量降幅超预期
item.description: 特斯拉周五公布的第四季度交付量降幅超过预期，年销售额连续第二年下滑，因为在税收减免政策取消后，特斯拉正努力刺激对其电动汽车的需求。【原文：Tesla reported a bigger-than-expected fall in fourth-quarter deliveries on Friday and posted a second straight decline in annual sales, as it struggled to whip up demand for its electric vehicles following the withdrawal of tax credits.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求压力持续存在，Rivian 2025 年交付量低于预期
item.description: Rivian 公司周五公布的 2025 年电动汽车交付量降幅略高于预期，这凸显了对价格较高的电动汽车需求的压力，因为该公司正准备在 2026 年上半年开始交付成本较低的车型。【原文：Rivian on Friday reported 2025 electric vehicle deliveries that fell slightly more than expected, underscoring the pressure on demand for higher-priced EVs as it prepares to start delivering a lower-cost model in the first half of 2026.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 就业数据可能使股市从假期的平静中惊醒，2026 年拉开帷幕
item.description: 新年的第一个完整交易周可能会让美国股市从冬日假期的沉睡中惊醒，因为月度就业数据将为投资者 2026 年繁忙的开端拉开序幕。【原文：The first full trading week of the new year could shake the U.S. stock market out of its winter holiday slumber as the monthly jobs data headlines a busy start to 2026 for investors.】

item.title: 近期下跌后风险偏好回升，2026 年美国股票期货开局良好
item.description: 美国股指期货在 2026 年的第一个交易日上涨，在华尔街 2025 年最后几个交易日下跌后有所回升，原因是投资者情绪改善，风险偏好上升。【原文：U.S. stock index futures advanced on the first trading day of 2026, recovering after Wall Street logged declines in the last few sessions of 2025, as improving investor sentiment increased risk appetite.】

item.title: 美国股票基金 2025 年强劲收官
item.description: 在截至 12 月 31 日的一周里，美国股票基金连续第二周吸引了大量资金流入，原因是投资者对人工智能推动的反弹带来的稳健年度收益感到欢欣鼓舞，并在年末对企业盈利前景持乐观态度。【原文：U.S. equity funds drew strong inflows for a second straight week in the week to December 31 as investors cheered solid annual gains from an AI-driven rally and ended the year on an optimistic note over the outlook for corporate earnings.】

item.title: 2025 年最后一周全球股票基金资金流入强劲
item.description: 全球股票基金在 2025 年最后一周出现强劲流入，原因是对人工智能推动的过去一年市场涨势的乐观情绪和稳健的企业盈利前景提升了风险偏好。【原文：Global equity funds saw strong inflows in the final week of 2025 as optimism over AI-driven market gains over the past year and a solid corporate earnings outlook lifted risk appetite.】

item.title: 印度批准价值 46 亿美元的电子元件项目
item.description: 印度信息技术部周五表示，印度已批准了许多公司价值 4186.3 亿卢比（46.4 亿美元）的项目，以促进国内电子元件制造业的激励计划。【原文：India has approved projects worth 418.63 billion rupees ($4.64 billion) from a host of companies to boost domestic manufacturing of electronic components under an incentive scheme, the country's IT ministry said on Friday.】

item.title: 欧元区制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，年底欧元区制造业进一步陷入萎缩
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，欧元区 12 月份的工厂活动进一步退入萎缩区间，生产在 10 个月以来首次出现下降，新订单的加速下降抑制了工厂活动。【原文：Euro zone factory activity retreated further into contraction territory in December as production decreased for the first time in 10 months, dampened by accelerating declines in new orders, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在欧洲主要市场销量下降，但在挪威创下纪录
item.description: 12 月份，特斯拉在欧洲一些主要市场的注册量有所下降，但在挪威的注册量激增，这证实了欧洲电动汽车开拓者销量创纪录的趋势，而 2025 年美国汽车制造商在该地区其他国家的市场份额则出现下滑。【原文：Tesla registrations fell in some key European markets in December, but surged in Norway confirming a trend of record sales in Europe's EV trailblazer while the U.S. automaker's market share crumbled across the rest of the region in 2025.】

item.title: 德国出口商在美国和中国主要市场面临长期低迷
item.description: 德国出口商协会（BGA）周五表示，德国出口商应为 2026 年美国和中国这两个最大市场的持续疲软做好准备，因为这两个市场几乎没有复苏的前景。【原文：German exporters should prepare for continued weakness in 2026 in their two largest markets, the United States and China, with little prospect of recovery, the BGA trade association said on Friday.】

item.title: 贝恩资本以 3.44 亿美元收购韩国运动服装公司 Echo Marketing
item.description: Echo 在周五提交的一份监管文件中称，贝恩资本将以 2166 亿韩元（1.5014 亿美元）的价格从其创始人和另一位股东手中收购韩国 Echo Marketing 公司 43.66% 的股份。【原文：Bain Capital is buying a 43.66% stake in South Korea's Echo Marketing , which owns local activewear brand Andar, from its founder and another shareholder for 216.6 billion won ($150.14 million), Echo said in a regulatory filing on Friday.】

item.title: 全球经济 随着订单回升，亚洲工厂在 2025 年末站稳脚跟
item.description: 亚洲的工厂强国在 2025 年的收官之战中站稳了脚跟，在新产品发布的帮助下，出口订单回升，几个主要经济体的经济活动也随之恢复增长。【原文：Asia's factory powerhouses closed 2025 on a firmer footing, with activity swinging back to growth in several key economies as export orders picked up, helped by new product launches.】

item.title: 2026 年股市开门红；贵金属延续闪亮涨势
item.description: 2026 年伊始，股市在节假日稀少的交易中表现积极，投资者准备迎接这一年的考验：人工智能引领的反弹、美联储换帅以及唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）担任总统期间可能出现的更多市场动荡。【原文：Stocks began 2026 on a positive note in holiday-thinned trade as investors braced for a year set to test the AI-led rally, usher in a change of guard at the Federal Reserve and potentially more market turbulence under Donald Trump's presidency.】

item.title: 继 2020 年以来最大年度跌幅之后，石油走高
item.description: 由于乌克兰无人机袭击俄罗斯石油设施，以及美国的封锁给委内瑞拉的出口造成压力，油价在 2026 年首个交易日出现上涨，而去年则创下了 2020 年以来的最大年度跌幅。【原文：Oil prices edged up on the first day of trade in 2026 after last year posting their biggest annual loss since 2020, as Ukrainian drones targeted Russian oil facilities and a U.S. blockade pressured Venezuela's exports.】

item.title: 中国人工智能芯片制造商比仁科技香港首秀飙升逾 100%，IPO 浪潮正在兴起
item.description: 中国人工智能芯片设计公司上海比仁科技周五在香港上市，股价涨幅超过一倍，为这个金融中心2026年的首次上市拉开了序幕。【原文：Shares of Chinese AI chip designer Shanghai Biren Technology more than doubled on their Hong Kong debut on Friday, kicking off the financial hub's first listing of 2026 with a bang.】

item.title: 美元在经历 8 年来最大幅度下跌后，为 2026 年开了个好头
item.description: 上周五，美元在2026年开局乏力，去年美元兑大多数货币的汇率都在挣扎，而日元则在10个月低点附近企稳，交易员们在等待本月的经济数据，以判断利率走势。【原文：The U.S. dollar made a feeble start to 2026 on Friday after struggling against most currencies last year, while the yen steadied near 10-month lows as traders awaited economic data this month to gauge the path of interest rates.】

item.title: 韩国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，韩国工厂活动因出口强劲而扩张
item.description: 周五进行的一项私营部门调查显示，由于出口需求回升，韩国工厂活动在连续两个月萎缩后于12月份有所扩大，制造商的乐观情绪飙升至3年半以来的最高点。【原文：South Korea's factory activity expanded in December, after two months of contraction, on a rebound in export demand, a private-sector survey showed on Friday, with manufacturers' optimism surging to a 3-1/2-year high.】

item.title: 三星电子强调在 HBM4 芯片供应方面取得的进展
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周五强调了该公司下一代高带宽内存（HBM）芯片（即 HBM4）的进展情况，称客户对其竞争力大加赞赏。【原文：Samsung Electronics highlighted on Friday progress in the company's next-generation high-bandwidth memory (HBM) chips, or HBM4, saying customers have praised its competitiveness.】

item.title: 百度人工智能芯片部门昆仑万维秘密申请香港上市
item.description: 中国互联网搜索巨头百度周五表示，其人工智能芯片部门昆仑万维已于1月1日向香港证券交易所秘密提交了上市申请，为分拆独立上市铺平了道路。【原文：Chinese internet search giant Baidu said on Friday its AI chip unit Kunlunxin has confidentially filed a listing application with the Hong Kong stock exchange on January 1, paving the way for a spin-off and separate listing.】

item.title: Starlink 计划在 2026 年降低卫星轨道以提高安全性
item.description: 美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）负责Starlink工程的副总裁迈克尔-尼科尔斯（Michael Nicolls）周四表示，Starlink将开始对其卫星星座进行重新配置，在2026年期间将轨道高度在550千米（342英里）左右的所有卫星降低到480千米。【原文：Starlink will begin a reconfiguration of its satellite constellation by lowering all of its satellites orbiting at around 550 km (342 miles) to 480 km over the course of 2026, Michael Nicolls, SpaceX's vice president of Starlink engineering, said on Thursday.】
